title: Industrial
description: Warehouse/Distribution Facilities • Manufacturing and Processing Facilities • Business Parks • Storage

title: Office
description: Office Buildings • Medical Offices • Surgery Centers • Hospitals • Call Centers • Data Centers

title: Retail/Commercial
description: Shopping Centers • Financial Buildings • Retail Stores • Parking Facilities • Restaurants

title: Residential
description: Apartments • Senior Apartments • Low Income and/or Affordable Housing • Mixed Use (Residential / Commercial)

title: Land
description: Industrial • Retail • Office • Commercial • Multifamily • Mixed Use • Acreage (Non-Residential) • Urban/Suburban

title: Public
description: Community Center / Recreation Center • Public Service / Municipal Service Building • Religious Facility

title: Other
